name: Aerobic
description: When attacking with Wind techniques, gets SPDEF and SPD.
effect: When a Temtem with this trait uses a Wind Type Technique, they get SPDEF and SPD.

name: Air Specialist
description: +15% damage with Wind techniques.
effect: Air Specialist raises the damage of the user's Wind Type techniques by an additional 15%.

name: Amphibian
description: When attacked with a Water technique, gets SPD.
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Amphibian is attacked by a Water Type technique, it gets SPD.

name: Anaerobic
description: When attacking with a Toxic technique, gets SPDEF and SPATK.
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Anaerobic uses a Toxic Type technique, it gets SPDEF and SPATK.

name: Apothecary
description: When attacking with a special technique, the target gets poisoned for 1 turn if it's a rival or regenerating for 1 turn if it's an ally or itself.
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Apothecary attacks with a special technique, if the target is an enemy, it gets the Poisoned Condition for 1 turn, or if the target is an ally or itself, it gets the Regenerated Condition for 1 turn.

name: Attack T
description: Currently unavailable.
effect: Attack T changes the Temtems second type to the type of the technique it’s about to use.

name: Autotomy
description: When entering the battlefield for the first time, gets evading for 2 turns.
effect: Autotomy causes the user to get the Evading Condition for 2 turns upon its first entry onto the battlefield.

name: Avenger
description: When an ally is knocked-out, gets SPATK and SPD.
effect: A temtem with Avenger gets SPATK and SPD whenever its ally is knocked out.

name: Benefactor
description: When an ally is damaged, restores 10% of max HP.
effect: Whenever the ally of the Temtem with this trait takes damage, they are healed by 10% of their max HP. This effect has no minimum value, meaning it can heal the ally for more HP than they lost due to getting attacked.

name: Body Stretch
description: When resting, gets regenerating for 2 turns.
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Body Stretch rests, it gains the Regenerated Condition for 2 turns.

name: Book Lungs
description: Damage taken from Water techniques is reduced by 30%.
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Book Lungs takes damage from a technique, the damage is reduced by 30%.

name: Botanist
description: +15% damage with Nature techniques.

name: Botanophobia
description: When attacked with a Nature technique, it is increased in damage by 50%.

name: Brawny
description: Physical techniques do 20% more damage.

name: Bully
description: While allies outnumber rivals, techniques inflict +30% damage.
effect: Allies are your total temtem remaining, even the ones that are not fighting.

name: Burglar
description: When attacking an asleep or exhausted Temtem, disables its gear.
effect: When a Temtem with Burglar attacks another Temtem that has the Asleep Condition or the Exhausted Condition, the defender's gear will be disabled for the remainder of the combat.

name: Caffeinated
description: Prevents the Asleep Status condition.

name: Callosity
description: When attacked with a physical technique, increases DEF by 1 stage.

name: Camaraderie
description: When attacked, reduces 50% damage if both allies are part of the same evolutionary line.

name: Channeler
description: Damage done with Special techniques is increased by 25%.

name: Cobweb
description: When applying a poison status condition, the target gets trapped for 2 turns too.
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Cobweb causes another Temtem to get the Poisoned Condition, it also causes it to get the Trapped Condition for 2 turns.

name: Cold-Natured
description: Instead of getting Cold, the Temtem gets Frozen.

name: Confined
description: When getting an trapped status condition, gets +1DEF and +1SPDEF if the attacker is itself.
effect: When a Temtem with Confined uses a technique that causes it to give itself the , it also gets +1DEF and +1SDEF.

name: Coward's Rest
description: When resting, gets for 2 turns.
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Coward's Rest rests, it gains the Evading Condition for 2 turns.

name: Deceit Aura
description: Techniques priority over is inverted during each turn the Temtem is present on the battlefield.
effect: Any turn in which a Temtem with Deceit Aura is present, the individual Temtem turn order is reversed.

name: Demoralize
description: When entering the battlefield, decreases enemy team SPD by 1 stage.
effect: Lowers the SPD of whatever Temtem the user switches into (even if one or both of them end up switching out). This also does ‘’’not’’’ change the order of the turn, as the turn order is locked in at the beginning of a round after Techniques have been chosen.

name: Determined
description: Prevents negative stat stage changes.

name: Dreaded Alarm
description: When a rival rests, they lose 20% of max HP.
effect: Enemy Temtem lose 20% of their max HP when resting during battle.

name: Earthbound
description: When attacking with a Earth technique, gets +1DEF.
effect: Earthbound gives the user +1DEF whenever they use an Earth Type technique.

name: Efficient
description: When attacking, STA cost is reduced by 30%
effect: When a Temtem with Efficient uses an offensive technique, the technique costs 30% less stamina.

name: Electric Synthesize
description: When attacked with an Electric technique, restores HP instead of receiving damage.

name: Energy Reserves
description: Tempedia description
effect: If HP is below 25% by the end of the turn, gets Vigorized for 2 turns.

name: Escapist
description: When entering the battlefield, removes the trapped status condition on the ally and prevents the trapped status condition on the ally and itself.
effect: While a Temtem with Escapist is on the battlefield, neither it nor its ally can get the Trapped Condition. Also, when it enters the battlefield, its ally loses the Trapped Condition if it has it.

name: Fainted Curse
description: When knocked-out, the attacker loses 30% of max HP.

name: Fast Charge
description: When a Digital ally enters the battlefield, gets SPD +2.

name: Fever Rush
description: When getting a Status condition, increases ATK by 1 stage.

name: Flawed Crystal
description: When attacked by a Mental, Toxic, or Electric Technique, increases damage by 50%.
effect: Damage taken from Mental, Toxic, and Electric Techniques is increased by 50%.

name: Friendship
description: Immune to ally's offensive techniques.

name: Furor
description: When HP is below 33%, techniques do 33% more damage.

name: Guardian
description: Prevents the cold, burned, poisoned and doomed condition on the ally.

name: Heat Discharge
description: When knocked-out, the attacker gets burned for 3 turns.
effect: When a Temtem knocks out another Temtem with Heat Discharge, it gets the Burned Condition for 3 turns.

name: Hover
description: When attacked with an Earth technique, reduces damage by 50%.

name: Hurry-wart
description: When entering the battlefield, the Temtem gets -1 Hold.
effect: When a Temtem with Hurry-wart enters the battlefield, all its techniques with a Hold lose 1.

name: Hydrologist
description: +15% damage with Water techniques.
effect: This article is a stub. You can help Temtem Wiki by expanding it.

name: Immunity
description: Resists damage from Toxic techniques.
effect: It is important to note that while a Temtem with Immunity cannot take damage from Toxic techniques, it can still receive the Poisoned Condition.

name: Individualist
description: Techniques targeting the ally will fail.
effect: The Temtem with this ability cannot use any moves on its ally.

name: Inductor
description: When a Electric technique is cast, restores 8% of max HP.
effect: Each time a Temtem with Inductor uses an Electric Type technique, 8% of its maximum life is restored.

name: Last Rush
description: Increases ATK,SPATK and SPD by 50% while the Temtem is the last ally standing.

name: Loneliness
description: Synergies won't work on both allies.

name: Marathonist
description: When attacking, gets -1SPD, and STA cost reduced is 50%.
effect: Marathonist causes the user to lose -1 SPD when attacking, but the stamina cost of the attack is halved.

name: Mental Alliance
description: Increases SPATK by 15% if an ally is Mental.

name: Mirroring
description: When attacked with a Special technique, the attacker gets 25% knockback damage.

name: Mithridatism
description: Prevents the poisoned Status condition.

name: Motivator
description: At the start of the turn, allies restore 10% of STA.

name: Mucous
description: Damage taken from Electric techniques is reduced by 30% and prevents the cold and burned status condition.

name: Neutrality
description: Prevent all Status Conditions.

name: Parrier
description: Damage taken from physical techniques is reduced by 30%.
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Parrier is attacked by a physical technique, it takes 30% less damage.

name: Patient
description: Restores 10% of max STA when using a Hold technique.

name: Plethoric
description: Increases SPD by 30% if HP is full.

name: Power Nap
description: At the start of the turn, restores 15% of max HP of an Asleep Temtem.
effect: At the start of the turn, restores 15% of max HP of an Asleep Temtem.

name: Prideful
description: When attacking, gets ATK+, SPATK+ and SPD+ if the target gets knocked-out.

name: Protector
description: "When entering the battlefield, the ally gets DEF+ and SPDEF+."
effect: describe battling effects here

name: Provident
description: When attacked by a Fire, Earth, or Melee technique, increases SPDEF by 1 Stage.

name: Punching Bag
description: Damage taken fromMelee techniques is reduced by 30%

name: Puppet Master
description: While HP is below 40%, received rival techniques get redirected to the ally.

name: Pyromaniac
description: +15% damage with Fire techniques.
effect: A Temtem with this trait deals an additional 15% damage on all fire-type techniques used.

name: Receptive
description: When getting a favorable status condition, increases its turns by 1.
effect: This effect will increase the duration of positive conditions applied to the Temtem, such as Regenerate, Vigorized and Evading.

name: Rejuvenate
description: When attacking with a physical technique, restore 15% of max HP.

name: Resilient
description: Cannot be knocked-out due to overexertion.
effect: If a Temtem with this trait is to knock itself out due to overexertion, it will survive with 1 HP.

name: Resistant
description: When getting a negative status condition, decreases its turns by 1.
effect: This Trait affected against, Cold, Frozen, Asleep, Trapped, Poisoned, Burned, Exhausted,

name: Rested
description: Increases ATK and SPATK by 30% during the first 2 turns the Temtem is on the battlefield.

name: Scavenger
description: Restores 20% of max HP if another Temtem is knocked-out.

name: Self-Esteem
description: When attacking, removes all negative status conditions if the target gets knocked-out.
effect: When a Temtem with Self-Esteem attacks and knocks out a Temtem, all of its negative Status Conditions are removed.

name: Sensei
description: When attacking with a Physical technique, uses SPATK, and when attacking with a special technique, uses the ATK.
effect: Whenever Sensei attacks with a Physical attack, the SPATK is used instead of the ATK. Similarly, if it is a Special attack, it uses the ATK instead of SPATK.

name: Sentinel
description: When entering the battlefield, removes the asleep status condition on the ally and prevents the asleep status condition on the ally and itself.
effect: While a Temtem with Sentinel is on the battlefield, neither it nor the ally can get the Asleep Condition. Also, when it enters the battlefield, if the ally has the Asleep Condition, it loses it.

name: Settling
description: Increases ATK by 8% for each turn the Temtem stays in the battlefield.
effect: The trait's effect on the Temtem resets as they switch around in battle.

name: Shared Pain
description: When receiving a consecutive attack in the same turn, the technique gets redirected to the ally.
effect: In-depth description here.

name: Skull Helmet
description: Damage taken from Mental or Melee techniques is reduced by 25%.
effect: Temtem with Skull Helmet take 25% less damage from techniques that are either Mental Type or Melee Type.

name: Soft Touch
description: When attacking an asleep target, it won't wake up.
effect: When a Temtem with this trait attacks a target afflicted with the asleep status condition with a damage dealing technique, the condition will not be removed.

name: Spoilsport
description: +25% damage with multi-target techniques.

name: Spreader
description: Single-target special techniques become multi-target, and damage done with them is reduced by 50%.
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Spreader attacks with a Special Technique, the attack affects the entire target team instead. However, it does half the damage.

name: Strong Liver
description: When attacked with a Toxic technique, restores HP instead of receiving damage.

name: Synergy Master
description: Damage done with synergy techniques is increased by 25% while the Temtem participate in the synergy.
effect: Increases the damage of synergy techniques for the ally Temtem when this Temtem can activate it, or when this Temtem uses a synergy technique that the ally activates.

name: Tactical Strike
description: Damage done with Hold techniques is increased by 15%.
effect: Whenever a Temtem with Tactical Strike attacks with a technique with a hold of 1 or more, the damage is increased by 15%.

name: Tardy Rush
description: Speed increases by 100% and ATK by 10% after 3 successive turns on the battlefield.
effect: When a Temtem with Tardy Rush is on the battlefield for 3 turns in a row, its Speed increases by 100% and its Attack by 10%. If it is swapped in, the turn it enters the battlefield counts as turn 1.

name: Team Elusive
description: Prevents multi-target techniques.
effect: When an enemy uses a multi-target technique that would hit a Temtem with Team Elusive, instead, it isn't affected. If Puppet Master would cause a Temtem with Team Elusive to be the target of an attack, it is not. The Temtem with Puppet Master remains the target.

name: Thick Skin
description: When attacked by a Wind Type technique, reduces damage by 50%.

name: Tireless
description: Prevents the overexertion turn penalization.

name: Toxic Affinity
description: Toxic Type techniques get type damage boost.
effect: Toxic Affinity multiplies the base damage of the user's Toxic Type techniques by x1.5, as if the user had STAB (Same-Type Attack Bonus). This stacks with actual STAB if the user is also a Toxic Type, resulting in a total multiple of x2.25 (1.5 x 1.5).

name: Toxic Farewell
description: When knocked-out, the attacker gets Poisoned for 3 turns.

name: Toxic Skin
description: When attacked with a physical technique, the attacker gets poisoned for 2 turns.

name: Trance
description: When attacked, gets Asleep and Regenerating for 2 turns, SPATK +2 and SPDEF +2 if HP is below 30%.

name: Trauma
description: When attacked by a physical technique, decreases DEF by 1 stage; when attacked by a special technique, decreases SPDEF by 1 stage

name: Tri-Apothecary
description: When attacking with a special technique, the target gets poisoned for 3 turns if it's a rival or regenerating for 3 turns if it's an ally or itself.
effect: This effect is often used for Pansun farming, allowing your team to stay on the field longer than would normal.

name: Unnoticed
description: Gets +1SPD after not receiving any rival attacks during the turn.
effect: When a Temtem with Unnoticed lasts a whole turn without being targeted by any rival attacks, it gets +1SPD.

name: Vigorous
description: Damage done when overexerting is increased by 50%.

name: Warm-Blooded
description: Prevents the Cold Status condition.

name: Water Affinity
description: Water techniques get a boost of the same type.
effect: This trait grants the user STAB (Same-Type Attack Bonus) to all water type attacks even if it is not water type, increasing the base damage of water type techniques by 50%.

name: Water Custodian
description: Water techniques targeting the ally will target the Temtem instead.
effect: While a Temtem with Water Custodian is on the battlefield, any Water Type techniques that target the ally will target this Temtem instead.

name: Withdrawal
description: When resting, restores 15% of max HP and removes the asleep status condition.

name: Wrecked Farewell
description: When knocked-out by overexertion damage, every Temtem loses 25% of max HP.
effect: When knocked-out by overexertion damage, self inflicted damage or damage infliced by allies, every Temtem loses 25% of max HP.

name: Zen
description: When getting the Asleep status condition, gets DEF +1 and SPDEF +1.
effect: When a Temtem is put to sleep with the Asleep status effect, it will immediately gain DEF+1 and SPDEF+1. This bonus will be kept when the Temtem wakes up.
